mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT count(merchant_id) added_merchant FROM (select count(*),merchant_id from 0085_cashier_login_log where `merchant_id` not in (select `merchant_id` from 0085_cashier_login_log where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()) >`create_time`) GROUP BY `merchant_id`) ca ) sb inner join ( select count(1) used_merchant from( select t.`merchant_id` from `0085_cashier_login_log` t where t.`create_time`>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()) AND t.merchant_id not in(630,631,2961,3928,4930,5010,5137,7271,7852,10217,11055,13088,25776,39463,66694,69524 ,72513,74942,76256) group by t.`merchant_id`) a ) b on 1=1 inner join ( select count(1) order_count from `order` t LEFT JOIN order_menu om on t.id=om.order_id LEFT JOIN menu me on me.id=om.menu_id LEFT JOIN merchant m on m.id=me.merchant_id where FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time)>'2017-04-01' AND m.id NOT in(630,631,2961,3928,4930,5010,5137,7271,7852,10217,11055,13088,25776,39463,66694,69524 ,72513,74942,76256) AND t.state in('pay','confirm') and t.pay_state in('pay','success') and t.`order_type`='supermarket' and t.pay_type in('supermarkt_cash','supermarkt_alibarcode','supermarkt_wxbarcode') and t.`create_time`>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()) ) c on 1=1 inner join ( select count(1) total_merchant from( select t.`merchant_id` from `0085_cashier_login_log` t WHERE FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time)>'2017-04-01' AND t.merchant_id not in(630,631,2961,3928,4930,5010,5137,7271,7852,10217,11055,13088,25776,39463,66694 ,69524,72513,74942,76256) group by t.`merchant_id`) a ) d on 1=1 inner join ( select count(1) total_order_count,sum(t.`origin`) total_turnover from `order` t LEFT JOIN order_menu om on t.id=om.order_id LEFT JOIN menu me on me.id=om.menu_id LEFT JOIN merchant m on m.id=me.merchant_id where m.id in(select t.`merchant_id` from `0085_cashier_login_log` t WHERE FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time)>'2017-04-01' AND t.id NOT IN (630,631,2961,3928,4930,5010,5137,7271,7852,10217,11055,13088,25776,39463,66694,69524 ,72513,74942,76256)) AND t.state in('pay','confirm') and t.pay_state in('pay','success') and t.`order_type`='supermarket' and t.pay_type in('supermarkt_cash','supermarkt_alibarcode','supermarkt_wxbarcode') group by t.id ) e on 1=1

select t.pay_type ,sum(if(t.pay_type='supermarkt_cash',t.`origin`,0)) cash_turnover ,sum(if(t.pay_type='supermarkt_alibarcode',t.`origin`,0)) ali_turnover ,sum(if(t.pay_type='supermarkt_wxbarcode',t.`origin`,0)) wechat_turnover from `order` t LEFT JOIN order_menu om on t.id=om.order_id LEFT JOIN menu me on me.id=om.menu_id LEFT JOIN merchant m on m.id=me.merchant_id where FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time)>'2017-04-01' AND m.id NOT in (630,631,2961,3928,4930,5010,5137,7271,7852,10217,11055,13088,25776,39463,66694,69524 ,72513,74942,76256) AND t.state in('pay','confirm') and t.pay_state in('pay','success') and t.`order_type`='supermarket' and t.pay_type in('supermarkt_cash','supermarkt_alibarcode','supermarkt_wxbarcode') and t.`create_time` > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()) group by t.pay_type

select b.*,c.`title` from ( select * from ( select t.`merchant_id`,sum(t.`origin`) today_origin from `order` t t.state in('pay','confirm') and t.pay_state in('pay','success') and t.`order_type`='supermarket' and t.pay_type in('supermarkt_cash','supermarkt_alibarcode','supermarkt_wxbarcode') and t.`create_time` > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(curdate()) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time)>'2017-04-01' group by t.merchant_id ) a order by a.today_origin desc ) b inner join merchant c on c.id=b.merchant_id where c.id NOT in(630,631,2961,3928,4930,5010,5137,7271,7852,10217,11055,13088,25776,39463,66694,69524 ,72513,74942,76256) limit 10
